description: Generate your next illustration on Tess, knowing that you directly benefit the artists who have created the underlying models. Train a private model on your own art, and make it public to start earning whenever its used. Tess is the first AI image generator that pays artists.
title: Tess â€” The First AI Image Generator that Pays Artists
introduction: Tess is the first AI image generator that pays artists. It offers a variety of subscription plans for individuals and teams, and a revenue sharing program for artists who contribute to Tess.
features: Subscription plans for individuals and teams
Revenue sharing program for contributing artists

faqs.question: What is the Starter plan?
faqs.answer: The Starter plan is for creators wanting to try out Tess for the first time. It includes 50 generations per month for $20 USD per month.

faqs.question: What is the Pro plan?
faqs.answer: The Pro plan is for customers who want to generate illustrations for personal or commercial projects. It includes 200 generations per month for $40 USD per month.

faqs.question: What is the Premium plan?
faqs.answer: The Premium plan is for customers and teams who need to generate even more illustrations for their projects. It includes 600 generations per month for $80 USD per month.

faqs.question: Are there custom plans for teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tess offers custom enterprise plans for creative teams looking to create a larger quantity of images over the course of a year. Teams can also pay for a custom, private model trained on their own artwork or illustrations.

faqs.question: How are artists compensated?
faqs.answer: Artists who contribute to Tess are compensated through a revenue sharing program. When users generate images with an artist's style, Tess pays out a royalty from the generation fees directly to the artist.
